awd_titl_txt: Free Radical and Photochemical Reactions of OrganophosphorusSystems
awd_abstract_narration: This grant from the Organic Dynamics Program supports the                       continuing work of Dr. Wesley G. Bentrude at the University of                  Utah.  The investigation will result in an improved                             understanding of the fundamental processes involved in                          reactions of organic phosphorus compounds.                                                                                                                      The experiments to be carried out by Dr. Bentrude will focus on                 photochemical and free radical reactions of both tricovalent                    and pentacovalent organophosphorus derivatives.  Efforts will                   be aimed at gaining a new understanding of the reactions of                     intact tetracovalent phosphoranyl radicals.  Spectroscopic and                  product studies will be employed to define the scope,                           mechanism, and structure-reactivity patterns of reactions in                    which these radicals lead to structurally novel products.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
